text: words is a standard file on Unix and Unix-like operating systems, and is simply a newline-delimited list of dictionary words. It is used, for instance, by spell-checking programs. The words file is usually stored in or . On Debian and Ubuntu, the file is provided by the package, or its provider packages , , etc. On Fedora and Arch Linux, the file is provided by the package. ==References== ==External links== * Sample words file from Duke CS department Category:Unix Category:Unix software
title: Words (Unix)
